comments: Always letting class out early, or sick AGAIN! I paid for an education, not excuses.
Doesn\'t really teach. Who put this guy in the front of the room?

Where do I begin....? Unkept, cold, aloof, takes himself and his job too seriously for his own good, a legend in his own mind, demeaning towards students, displays favortism towards females, NEGATIVE human being. Does not want his students to succeed, egotistical, his character flaws are endless and impede with his attempt at teaching subject
Consistantly cut class short. His ego seems to get in the way of real teaching.

Good choice if ......I received a 40% + grade and still got a "C". Required no text and material was not relevant to todays business enviroment. Might want to research other Prof options if you are expecting to learn the subject matter.
